original: Krook, Isak William Charles, prost, Aseda, f. 27/9/91 i Billeberga, Malmöh. 1., av folikskoUär. Gustaf K. o. Hanna Mathiasson. G. 18 m. Anna Cecrlia Eriksson. Barn: Anna Maria f. 20, Mats 26. — Stud:ex. i Lund 10, fil. kand. där 12, teol. kand., prakt. teol. prov samt prästv. f. Växjö stift 16, teol. lic. 33, teol. dr 35. Tyg. som v. kommin. i Drev, Asa, Hänger o. Jön-köp. samt som v. pastor i Tofteryd c. Döderhuit, kommin. i Rydaholm 19, kyrkoh. i Gränna 25, i Aseda sed. 41, kontr:prost i Vista lids kontr. 28-41. Ordf. i Sv:es kristl. krigsmannaförb. Skr.: Kristna som undfly Gud (25), Mysterium Christi (32), Viktor Rydbergs lära om Kriistus (akad. avli. 35), Kris’tus biliden. En stud. i sv. pred. oimkr. sekels|ki|ftet (47), art. i tidn. o. tidsikr. LNO;
translated: Krook, Isak William Charles, pastor, Aseda, b. 27/9/91 in Billeberga, Malmöhus County. Son of school teacher Gustaf K. and Hanna Mathiasson. Married to Anna Cecilia Eriksson since 1918. Children: Anna Maria b. 1920, Mats b. 1926. - Completed secondary school in Lund in 1910, received a Bachelor of Philosophy degree there in 1912, a Bachelor of Theology degree, practical theology examination, and was ordained as a priest in the Växjö Diocese in 1916, obtained a Licentiate of Theology in 1933, and a Doctorate of Theology in 1935. Served as an assistant minister in Drev, Asa, Hänger, and Jönköping, and as a pastor in Tofteryd and Döderhult, assistant minister in Rydaholm in 1919, parish priest in Gränna in 1925, in Aseda since 1941, and archdeacon in the Vista Lid's deanery from 1928 to 1941. Chairman of the Swedish Christian Soldiers Association. Written works: Christians Evading God (1925), Mysterium Christi (1932), Viktor Rydberg's teachings about Christ (doctoral dissertation, 1935), Christ's Image. A study of Swedish preaching at the turn of the century (1947), articles in newspapers and periodicals. Knight of the Order of the North Star.

publications.name: Kris'tus biliden. En stud. i sv. pred. oimkr. sekels|ki|ftet
